Lyft opens first permanent office in NYC

I rarely post my own accomplishments on LinkedIn because they are mostly small steps in progress and I believe there is entirely too much self-aggrandizement on LinkedIn.  However, today is my day.  I successfully defended my dissertation this afternoon and am now Dr. Terry Fernsler.
GitHub announces new developer Community Forum and Marketplace free trials
GitHub launches Dependency Graph to help companies understand which projects they rely on
San Franciscans ditching Uber, says consumer report

- Official title in team is "Unicorn Hunter" - PM for Beamery CRM implementation - Moving from Lever to Greenhouse ATS - Shipped our metrics project - establishing recruiting SLA's and metrics for 2016/2017- Mentoring and training a Talent Coordinator to help her move into a Sourcing role (weekly meetings/Shadow sourcing/training on tech stack) - Always wearing multiple hats, with an emphasis on training the talent partner team on industry diversity sourcing standards - Identify and convince top Engineering/ Leadership talent to join us at GitHub (averaging about 2 sourced hires a month) - Partner closely with HM's to understand all aspects of the role- The go to person to build out GitHub templates, move issues and repos and any other technical product related questions on the recruiting team - Built internal Talent team wiki - Shipped webinar for SHPE

- Joined the company when there was about 250 employees. 600+ employees now and hiring a few hundred more next year! - Manage full cycle recruiting process for Engineering/Infrastructure organization ensuring a smooth and positive candidate experience- Shipping things and coding/automating things where I can- Working to define team/company SLA's - Lever ATS- Insert applicable tech buzzwords here....(AWS, C, Linux, Ruby, MySQL, Puppet, CloudFormation, Jenkins, and so many more). :P - Develop and maintain strong relationships with the Directors of Systems, VP of Engineering, Infrastructure and Security- Currently reading the O'Reilly Systems Programming book (it is a real page turner) :P - Working on consistency via company job postings- Recommending product features to improve the application process for external candidates - Leading team training classes for online diversity sourcing tactics and other sourcing tools - I like metrics and I realize that not all are created equally

(Ruby on Rails, Go, Puppet, physical infra, Node.js, Clojure, MySQL, DevOps, Chef, Bash, QA)My wardrobe is now consumed by Octocats, although I tend to lean towards being a dog lover. I don't use enough Gifs on our internal chat, and I can usually be found near the jerky supply in the kitchen at the office. Some stuff I have done so far! - Shipped custom strategy around hiring diverse engineering members into various orgs/departments- Sourced and hired a number of diverse Engineering Managers, Directors, individuals contributors and more - Design and implement search strategies to identify and attract top Engineering and G&A talent- Spearheaded external branding efforts by initiating company Glassdoor reviews, went from 0-14+ reviews and increased page views by %90- Expanded source of influence via recruiting marketing - Designed and launched Linkedin careers page, averaging 3K+ views per job posting - Designed and launched company Glassdoor. Taking company from 0 reviews and 600 views to multiple reviews, a 4.8 rating and 40K+ views a month.- Initiated company Recruitment video (WIP)- Partner with hiring managers, colleagues and VP of Engineering to restructure the Engineering interview process- Interviewed fellow recruiting team members and assisted with training of new hires

recommendations: Jon Raymond
We are hiring for Alexa Communications in Seattle and Santa Cruz.  Be in touch if you are interested!
February 23, 2015, Jon managed Tessa directly

Tessa had an immediate impact upon joining The Climate Corporation.  She was able to train her colleagues in many innovative sourcing techniques, improve process and carry a very challenging full-life-cycle recruiting load.  Month after month, Tessa demonstrated consistency and the ability to find great talent that filled engineering roles that nobody could fill.  Tessa is the consummate professional that provides an exceptional candidate experience and manages internal and external stakeholders well.  I strongly endorse Tessa as a full-life-cycle recruiter who can source candidates like few can.  Her positive approach and genuine caring about her team and candidates is what sets her apart.

September 6, 2013, Omar worked with Tessa but at different companies

I received a call from Tessa, and she was an absolute gem from the start. She immediately struck me as someone who possesses an innate understanding of her clients leveraged against the values of Robert Half Technology as more than a product, but a brand. Throughout our conversations and later in-person meetings, I was quite intrigued by her ability to light up a room with her friendly personality that could make anyone's day- a trait often unheard of these days. Tessa paid close attention to what I was looking for in a position, and she fortified its essence by asking the right questions and matching me with the right recruiters to ultimately land me at my current position. Tessa is the kind of professional I would want on my team- I highly recommend her and wish her the best at Modis.

We are hiring for Alexa Communications in Seattle and Santa Cruz.  Be in touch if you are interested!
June 23, 2015, Tessa reported directly to Jon

I joined Climate because of Jon and was torn about leaving the company because of him as well. Jon immediately proved himself to be a strong people Manager, and was able to give me the mentorship and career advice to grow in my career, that many of my prior managers struggled in providing. What stood out most about Jon was his willingness to advocate for his team. When upper management wanted to change the hiring process, Jon was always the first person to ask why. He challenged change appropriately and welcomed it when required. Jon hired the majority of Climate's strongest players both on and off of the Recruiting team.I would run at the opportunity to work for Jon again, and hope that I someday get the chance.

May 15, 2014, Jason worked with Tessa in the same group

I had the pleasure of convincing Jason to join our team at Robert Half International, and it was evident right away that he had tremendous abilities as a Staffing Manager.  Jason's incredible adaptability with potential clients and candidates allowed him to excel quickly. His ability to identify the needs of the client, allowed him to act with speed and accuracy in finding the best talent for the role. Jason never sacrificed quantity for quality and his attention to detail, coupled with his enthusiasm and drive, made for a superior team member. Jason's personable connection with the customers and relentless perseverance drove him to become the top performer on several occasions while at Robert Half.  It is rare that I work with individuals in the staffing industry that I would vouch for, but with his abilities and dedication, I am confident in Jason's skill set and have no doubt that he will excel in any role that he pursues.

summary: Full lifecycle recruiter with a passion for sourcing top industry talent, while building out diverse and inclusive engineering teams. I have had the pleasure of being successful in both small and large software companies but I get the most satisfaction when I am building teams/companies from the ground up! I like to think that I am very good at surviving off of pure caffeine, wearing the worst shoes in the rain and putting bacon on things that should not have bacon...wait, what should not have bacon? Some of my greatest personal accomplishments include successfully using a Windows phone, raising a puppy, holding the title of most pudding cups consumed at my high school, killing a succulent, and growing up in one of the best states (Idaho)! Lyft is a great place to work and we are hiring! Get in touch with me if you are interested in learning more about what it is we do and how your background could be a match.
name: Tessa Wilder
title: Technical Recruiting @ Lyft
